mapper.select: SELECT O.ORDER_NUM AS orderNum, -- 발령 번호 O.APPOINTMENT_DATE AS appointmentDate, -- 발령 일자 O.EMP_NUM AS empNum, -- 사번 E.EMP_NAME AS empName, -- 성명 O.ORDER_SITUATION AS orderSituation, -- 발령 구분 (임시저장/발령확정) P_PREV.POS_NAME AS previousPosition, -- 이전 직위 P_NEW.POS_NAME AS newPosition, -- 발령 직위 D_PREV.DEPT_NAME AS previousDepartment, -- 이전 부서 D_NEW.DEPT_NAME AS newDepartment -- 발령 부서 FROM ORDERS O JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON O.EMP_NUM = E.EMP_NUM LEFT JOIN POSITIONS P_PREV ON P_PREV.POS_NUM = E.POS_NUM -- 직원의 현재 직위 LEFT JOIN POSITIONS P_NEW ON P_NEW.POS_NUM = O.POS_NUM -- 발령 직위 LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT D_PREV ON D_PREV.DEPT_NUM = E.DEPT_NUM -- 직원의 현재 부서 LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT D_NEW ON D_NEW.DEPT_NUM = O.DEPARTMENT_NUM -- 발령 부서 ORDER BY O.APPOINTMENT_DATE DESC; -- 예: 발령 일자 기준 내림차순 정렬
